Academic Computing and Communications Center     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Academic Computing and Communications Center      Academic Computing and Communications Center   Main Menu    Services           Communication and Collaboration    Computing Services    Infrastructure    Professional Services    Research    Security    Teaching and Learning         Support           Academic Continuity    Academic Multimedia Lab and Lightboard Studio    ARC Helpdesk    C-Stop BSB    C-Stop LHS    Daley Library Helpdesk    LTS Support Office         Service Status           Service Notices         News           All News         Forms    About           Identity    Leadership    Policies    Reports    Jobs          Eyebrow menu    WebStore    Online Training    Answers    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                      Support      View Menu               Service Portal             Browse Answers              Get Training             Request Support         hide           Academic Multimedia Lab and Lightboard Studio  The AML offers multimedia production, editing, and equipment resources for faculty and students.             ARC Helpdesk  This helpdesk offers general support to all and ARC classroom support for faculty.             C-Stop BSB  This C-Stop provides general and technical support to all, as well as password reset assistance and equipment lending.             C-Stop LHS  This C-Stop has general and technical support available to all, as well as password reset assistance.             Daley Library Helpdesk  The IDEA Commons at Daley Library has general support available to students, faculty, and staff.             LTS Support Office  This office provides faculty support for teaching and learning services.           Walk-in Support Locations      .
